mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.func_type_code , t1.interface_no , t1.conf_type , t1.validate_state , t1.create_time , t1.create_by , t1.modify_time , t1.modify_by , t1.priority from ext_function_interface_ref t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update ext_function_interface_ref t1 set t1.rule_group_code =#{dto.ruleGroupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.modify_by =#{dto.modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.modify_time =systimestamp where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from ext_function_interface_ref t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
delete from ext_function_interface_ref t1 where t1.func_type_code =#{funcTypeCode} and t1.conf_type =#{confType}
